title: Why does not riot games care about ranked queue?
body:
Hi, my dear soloq mates.

I hope you're well.

I come today with a huge anger because second consecutive game that someone on my team gets afk and I lose 18, 20 pl.

So it comes to my mind how can this game be so unfair?
You dedicate to play well, watch videos and when someone gets afk you simply miss the game.

I think the RIOT GAMES is being such a stupid after 8 seasons has not reversed this to help the players, and I come today with a solution.

Why not just punish the players who stay afk? while the rest of the team does not lose pl!
I believe that this is the most fair way to balance things being thus punished only those that harm the game.

Sorry for some bad word I'm very upset.
